Class Controller<T extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of object managed (must be Serializable)
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController<T>
public class Controller<T extends Serializable> extends Object implements IController<T>
Generic controller for managing CRUD operations on a specific type in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system. Uses a service for validation and a storage for persistence.
